
MACRO ECONOMY: GDP, Inflation, Import & Export, International Trade, Foreign Exchange, Money Quantity, Unemployment, 

Goods Market (Production, Lager), Capital Market (Savings, Investments), Labor Market (Employment, Population Structure), Price vs. Value, Demand vs. Supply, Access to Resources, Trade & International Contracts

Assumin no waste.


Supply: 

$$\begin{split} &
E = C + S + T + M - X
\end{split}$${#eq-gdpsupply}

$$\begin{split} &
E = W  + E_P + E_B + T_B + E_G - Z_G
\end{split}$${#eq-ecoincome}


Demand:

$$\begin{split} &
V_I = C + I + G + X - M
\end{split}$${#eq-gdpdemand}


Equilibrium:

$$\begin{split} &
E = V_I       \\&
W - C = S = I        \\&
C + S = W        \\&
C + I = R
\end{split}$${#eq-ecoequi}


Domestic Production & International Trade:

$$\begin{split} &
V_S = E + T - B + D
\end{split}$${#eq-gdp}

$$\begin{split} &
V_S = V_I + R_M - R_X
\end{split}$${#eq-gdp}

$$\begin{split} &
V_N = V_S - D
\end{split}$${#eq-nnpnsp}

$$\begin{split} &
V_N = E + T - B
\end{split}$${#eq-nnp}


Productivity & Monetary Value:

$$\begin{split} &
P \cdot V_I = U \cdot Q
\end{split}$${#eq-moneyquant}

Input:

$$\begin{split} &
Input = f(Resouces, Labor, Capital) \text{ = Work = } \Delta Energy
\end{split}$${#eq-ecoinput}


Output:

$$\begin{split} &
Output = V_I \text{ = Goods + Services = Production = } \Delta State
\end{split}$${#eq-ecooutput}


Productivity:

$$\begin{split} &
Productivity = \frac{Output}{Input} = \frac{\Delta State}{\Delta Energy} = \frac{Production}{Work} = \frac{V_I}{p \cdot v}
\end{split}$${#eq-ecooutput}
